SELECT es.id AS 'mtmyEveryoneSayId', es.parent_id AS 'parentId', es.say_type, es.position_type AS 'positionType', es.content_id AS 'contentId', es.content, es.user_id AS 'userId', es.user_name AS 'userName', es.user_photo AS 'userPhoto', es.user_level AS 'userLevel', es.create_date AS 'createDate', (CASE WHEN g.goods_name IS NOT NULL THEN g.goods_name WHEN u.name IS NOT NULL THEN u.name WHEN o.name IS NOT NULL THEN o.name ELSE '无' END) AS 'showName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_everyone_say es LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_everyone_say_like esl ON esl.say_id = es.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods g ON g.goods_id = es.content_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user u ON u.id = es.content_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o ON o.id = es.content_id WHERE es.del_flag = '0' AND es.say_type = '1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(es.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(es.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND es.position_type = #{positionType}
AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND g.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND (g.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR o.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%'))
